   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to BestMSM's documentation!
===================================
BestMSM is a Python package with a set of tools for constructing 
a Markov state model (MSM) as we have implemented this methodology
in the Best group.

Modules:
========

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   trajectory
   msm
   pcca
